title: Teacher's Dashboard
description: Manage your students, observations, and educational resources. Access support plans, generate activities, and review progress.
subtitle: Today, you're guiding your group's learning with the help of Kary AI.

studentList.title: Assigned Students View
studentList.karySuggestionDefault: Adapt pace or language in upcoming tasks.
studentList.noStudentsAssigned: You don't have any students assigned yet.

aiAlerts.title: AI Cognitive Alerts
aiAlerts.description: Suggestions generated by Kary about students to enhance learning, without exposing raw emotional data.
aiAlerts.noAlerts: There are no new suggestions from the AI at this time.

viewStudentsDesc: Access the list of your assigned students and their profiles.
recordObservationDesc: Note important observations about progress or behavior.
assignResourceDesc: Share learning materials with your students.
viewReportsDesc: Check performance reports for your groups.
